companyInfo.name: Shu Yi Shi Kong (Chengdu) Culture Technology Co., Ltd.
companyInfo.nameEn: Shu Yi Shi Kong (Chengdu) Culture Technology Co., Ltd.
companyInfo.subtitle: G-Box is the world's largest holographic digital consumption platform, using naked-eye holographic technology that requires no wearable devices and supports unlimited viewers, redefining human-machine interaction.

intro: Shu Yi Shi Kong (Chengdu) Culture Technology Co., Ltd. focuses on the research and application of naked-eye holographic display technology. G-Box is our world's largest holographic digital consumption platform, using lenticular lens and stereoscopic display technology, combined with AI algorithms to calculate image spatial depth, achieving true naked-eye 3D holographic imaging.

G-Box utilizes the refraction principle of lenticular lenses to refract the display image to the edge of the optical device, achieving an expanded display effect that increases the display area and greatly enhances the viewer's sense of immersion. Through AI algorithms to calculate image spatial depth, using advanced neural network models trained by dozens of depth models and image databases, it can handle various types of uploaded images to calculate depth and generate multi-view images, simulating real 3D holographic images.

G-Box provides a more natural viewing experience and will redefine the way humans interact with machines. It can re-express the three-dimensional structure of the real world, metaverse, or virtual world, and finally display it in the form of "software + hardware + content".
aboutUs.mission: Through naked-eye holographic technology, enable everyone to own their first holographic device, enjoy immersive 3D holographic experiences without wearing any equipment, and promote the development of the metaverse industry.
aboutUs.vision: To become the world's leading holographic digital consumption platform, using technological innovation to break the limitations of traditional holographic technology and bring holographic experiences into every household.
values: Equal emphasis on technological innovation and user experience
Deep integration of hardware and software
Equal emphasis on content ecosystem and platform construction

coreAdvantages.title: Naked-Eye Holographic Technology
coreAdvantages.description: Using lenticular lens and stereoscopic display technology, users don't need to wear any equipment, with unlimited viewers. Utilizing the refraction principle of lenticular lenses to achieve expanded display images, greatly enhancing viewer immersion.

coreAdvantages.title: AI Intelligent Learning
coreAdvantages.description: Calculate image spatial depth through AI algorithms, using advanced neural network models trained by dozens of depth models and image databases, capable of handling various types of uploaded images to calculate depth and generate multi-view images.

coreAdvantages.title: 49 Viewpoints
coreAdvantages.description: G-Box has 49 viewpoints, far exceeding the 1 viewpoint of mobile phones and 2 viewpoints of VR, providing a more realistic and immersive 3D holographic experience.

coreAdvantages.title: 60-Degree Ultra-Wide Angle
coreAdvantages.description: 60-degree ultra-wide viewing angle, more natural viewing experience, no pressure for multiple simultaneous viewers.

focusAreas.name: Naked-Eye 3D
focusAreas.description: Special optical material imaging, no wearable devices required

focusAreas.name: Auto 3D Conversion
focusAreas.description: Automatic 3D conversion from images and photos

specs.name: Viewpoints
specs.description: Mobile: 1 viewpoint | VR: 2 viewpoints | G-Box: 49 viewpoints

features.name: Lenticular Lens Technology
features.description: Utilizing the refraction principle of lenticular lenses to refract the display image to the edge of the optical device, achieving an expanded display effect that increases the display area and greatly enhances viewer immersion.

features.name: AI Depth Calculation
features.description: Calculate image spatial depth through AI algorithms, using advanced neural network models trained by dozens of depth models and image databases, capable of handling various types of uploaded images to calculate depth.

features.name: Multi-View Generation
features.description: Generate multi-view images to simulate real 3D holographic images. High-precision Unity model support ensures content quality.

features.name: Intelligent Control
features.description: APP remote control for convenient user operation and content management. Supports automatic 3D conversion, converting images and photos to 3D holographic images.

competitors.title: Competitor Analysis
competitors.subtitle: G-Box Advantages Over Traditional Holographic Technologies

comparisons.name: Polarized 3D Technology
comparisons.description: Only 2 viewpoints, must rely on 3D glasses to watch. Mainly used in cinemas, expensive, lacks content sources, and causes strong discomfort during long viewing.
comparisons.gboxAdvantage: G-Box has 49 viewpoints, no glasses needed, naked-eye viewing, comfortable and natural.

comparisons.name: Fan-Type LED Rotating Screen
comparisons.description: Rotating screens use the persistence of vision principle, can achieve transparent background, but cannot provide immersive 3D experience. The device must be connected to external power, cannot be miniaturized, minimum size is 50cm. The high-speed rotating fan also has noise and safety hazards.
comparisons.gboxAdvantage: G-Box is compact (14.5cm x 18.9cm x 4cm), weighs only 660g, highly portable, no noise, safe and reliable.

features.name: Digital Figures
features.description: Highly integrated digital figures, such as the "Battle Through the Heavens" limited edition containing 12 character figures, globally limited to 3000 units.

features.name: Unique Assets
features.description: Permanently recorded on the blockchain, ensuring the uniqueness and authenticity of digital assets.

features.name: Tradable
features.description: Supports second-hand market trading of G-Box, digital assets can be transferred.

features.name: Globally Limited
features.description: Limited edition G-Box with limited release, has collectible value.

freeChannel.title: Free Channel
freeChannel.subtitle: Asset Transfer Mechanism Between G-App and G-Box

channels.name: G-App
channels.description: Real-name registration, bind G-Box to obtain assets, non-tradable. Users manage digital assets through G-App.

channels.name: Transfer
channels.description: Users can transfer digital assets to other users. User B and the box are on the same network, can initiate binding operation. After successful binding, User B can transfer non-IP digital products in and out.

channels.name: G-Box
channels.description: Anonymous purchase, can transfer non-IP digital products, tradable. Supports second-hand market trading.

current.title: Market Status
current.content: Holographic projection technology benefits from national policy support, accelerated technology iteration, and expanded investment scale. China's holographic imaging industry has developed rapidly, holographic projection patent technologies continue to emerge, promoting the rapid operation of the metaverse industry, and is expected to become the first entry point to the metaverse. Holographic projection technology has been successfully applied in film and television, medical, education, cultural tourism, military and other industries. With the rapid development of the holographic imaging industry, application scenarios are expected to continue to expand. China's holographic projection industry market size is expected to be 9.8 billion yuan in 2021, expected to exceed 10 billion yuan in 2022, and is expected to maintain an average annual compound growth rate of 9.0% in the next five years. By 2026, the overall holographic projection market size will approach 15 billion yuan.

points.name: No Consumer Holographic Products
points.description: No miniaturized devices, high requirements for venues, environment, glasses and content, cannot be directly sold to individual players.

points.name: Traditional Holographic Technology
points.description: From hardware to software, from IP to works, the entire product cycle is long, division of labor is cumbersome and expensive.

points.name: Unsatisfactory Experience
points.description: In naked-eye scenarios, almost only visual deception can provide 3D effects, unable to achieve immersive experience.
